about.name: Mayank Mohapatra
about.intro: Hi there, this is Mayank Mohapatra — great to meet you! I’m a B.Tech undergraduate at NIT Agartala who enjoys building and securing real-world systems. I’m deeply interested in Information Security and DevOps, especially in understanding how production systems break, how to secure them, and how to make deployments faster, safer, and more reliable. I love working close to infrastructure—optimizing CI/CD pipelines, containerizing applications, and hardening cloud deployments. I’m always curious about how things work under the hood and how to make them work better.

experience.title: Lead Member, Dev Workflow Team
description: Optimized CI/CD pipelines and reduced Docker image size for a production-scale Python backend deployed on Google App Engine (GAE).
Improved GitHub Actions workflows using regex-based triggers to prevent unnecessary builds and injection-based exploits.
Resolved gRPC connection issues, improving stability across distributed services.
Worked with Python, Docker, GitHub Actions, TypeScript, and Google App Engine.

experience.title: Backend Intern
description: Developed Spring Boot APIs for the Nodal Summary Service.
